doc:
ZaSu Pitts https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ZaSu_Pitts 0 ZaSu Pitts (; born Eliza Susan Pitts; January 3, 1894 – June 7, 1963) was an American actress who starred in many silent dramas, including Erich von Stroheim's epic silent film Greed, and comedies, transitioning successfully to mostly comedy films with the advent of sound films. ZaSu_Pitts ( ; born Eliza_Susan_Pitts ; January_3_,_1894 – June_7_,_1963 ) was an_American_actress who starred in many_silent_dramas , including Erich_von_Stroheim 's_epic_silent_film_Greed , and comedies , transitioning successfully to mostly_comedy_films with the_advent of sound_films .
